segment.source: Welcome to {0}. First, a project is created online at the {1} site. Then, export a Portable Transcriber Format (PTF) file and import it here.
Click your avatar to transcribe or review.
Please select row(s) to remove assignment.
Deleting the team will delete all projects of the team.
Import file will not include latest exported data.
This file was not exported from the latest version. Reexport your PTF file from the online version.
Import File does not contain current project.
Current data in project {name0} was last exported {date0}.
Current data in project {name0} has never been exported.
Project {name0} was previously imported with a newer file: {date1}
Not a valid Portable Transcriber File
Please verify by clicking on the link in the authorization email sent to your account.
Choose a person who will act as a {0} for projects in this group.
All Editors are allowed to transcribe.
Cannot delete members from the All Members group
This role is included in a higher role and cannot be deleted.
Your log in token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Not a valid Incremental Transcriber File (ITF).
Import File does not contain current project.
Please select file to be uploaded.
Online changes made since data provided to offline member:
You must satisfy all criteria to sync.
Book not included in this project
Passage {0}.{1}: Paratext project does not contain book {2}.
Passage {0}.{1} {2}: Passage must not span chapters.
Your paratext login has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Your login token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
You must login with a valid paratext login to sync projects.
You are not a member of a {lang0} Paratext Project.
Do you have a Paratext Account?
Are you connected to the Internet?
Do you have permission to edit the Paratext project text?
Are you connected to a {lang0} Paratext project?
Please click the following link to accept the invitation:
Enter the email address of the member to invite.
No Projects are associated with this group.
Find a language by name, code, or country
Log Out and Force Data Reload
Something went wrong. The developers need to address this issue.
Invitation not accepted. You must login with the email that the invitation was sent to.
Log out of other tab required
Unable to load project data offline.
Do you want to save before leaving this page?
Your session will expire in {0} seconds. Would you like to continue?
Please select files to be uploaded.
File {0} is an unsupported file type.
Drag and drop files here, or click here to browse for the files.
Drag and drop a file here, or click here to browse for the file.
Upload an Incremental Transcriber File (itf file) exported from the Desktop Extension.
Upload Change Data from Desktop Extension
Upload complete Project Data from PTF
You can upload audio files in .mp3, .m4a, .wav or .ogg format.
This project contains invalid references and will not sync to Paratext properly.
Select a column head and use CTRL-V to append table rows.
Deleting your member will block you from using the program and remove references to your work.
Install Paratext to be able to sync.
Log out and log in with Paratext button
Invalid number of columns ({0}). Expecting 5 columns.
Invalid number of columns ({0}). Expecting 6 columns.
Transcription updated by another person or process.
This display allows you to review the transcription that is stored.
Your login token has expired and can't be automatically renewed. Please log out and login again.
Export the full project to store locally or share with another offline member. Export incremental file to import changes into online app.
The project cannot be exported. The export file is too large.
Please enter in the format: singular/plural
